page.title: 17HOME LIFE:CHRISTMAS
page.content: On Christmas Day I get up early to open my presents.Christmas Day is a special day when we celebrate Jesus Christ's birthday.It's on the 25th of December.I open all my presents and play with them.We have a special dinner,a chicken and a bottle of wine.We go and have tea at our Aunty and Uncle's.Tea is a bit like dinner only 5 hours later.After tea we watch television.Television is a square box with a screen on which pictures and films are shown.We celebrate by drinking wine and beer.Wine is a drink which if you have too much it will make you ill and beer is the same.Then we go home and go to bed. A week later it is New Year's Eve and Mum and Dad go out to celebrate. Caroline Melland.
